cause.description:
This cause will direct donations to NARAL pro-Choice America Foundation. NARAL works to provide voter education on pro- and anti- choice legislation across America, and provides educational literature and regular publications highlighting the political struggle to maintain legal reproductive choice. NARAL's activities extend to all forms of reproductive choice, including educational support.
1. Reproductive choice is private and personal
2. Legal reproductive choice is worthy of protection
cause.mission: Support voter education with the purpose of protecting reproductive choice
cause.name: Keep Abortion Legal
